BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO PISLEG_CASE_PO_GEN_TRN (GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,STR_CASE_ID, STR_CASE_NUMBER, NUM_DEPT_CODE, NUM_ADV_ID, NUM_COURT_ID, NUM_TOTAL_AMOUNT, STR_PO_ORDER_NUMBER, DT_PO_ORDER_DATE, STR_PO_ORDER_PLACE_BY, NUM_UPDATION_FLAG,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GDT_EFFECT_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
DELETE FROM PISLEG_CASE_PO_GEN_DTL A WHERE STR_PO_ORDER_NUMBER=? and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE PISLEG_CASE_PO_GEN_TRN A SET A.STR_CASE_ID=?, A.STR_CASE_NUMBER=?, A.NUM_DEPT_CODE=?, A.NUM_ADV_ID=?, A.NUM_COURT_ID=?, A.NUM_TOTAL_AMOUNT=?, A.STR_PO_ORDER_NUMBER=?, A.DT_PO_ORDER_DATE=?, A.STR_PO_ORDER_PLACE_BY=?, A.NUM_UPDATION_FLAG=?, A.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, A.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?, A.GDT_EFFECT_DATE=?, A.GDT_ENTRY_DATE=?, A.GNUM_ISVALID=?, A.GNUM_SEAT_ID=? WHERE A.STR_PO_ORDER_NUMBER=? and A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PISLEG_CASE_PO_GEN_TRN SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE STR_PO_ORDER_NUMBER=? and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PISLEG_CASE_PO_GEN_DTL SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE STR_PO_ORDER_NUMBER=? and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
